title.native: イクシオン サーガ DT

description: The game and anime follow Kon Hokaze, a boy who embarks on a journey from our world to an alternate world known as Mira, which is full a mysterious energy known as Alma. After saving Princess Ecarlate from attackers, he soon finds himself in the middle of a struggle around Alma.
synonyms: イクシオン サーガ ディーティー

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Transgender
tags.description: Features a character whose gender identity differs from the sex they were assigned at birth.

title.native: イクシオン サーガ ED

name.native: ナボコフ・ジャグラバーク
エレクパイル・デュカキス

node.description:
**Height:** 167 cm (5'6") 
**Other:** Named his cat "Nyanko-Sensei" 
**Agency:** Aoni

[Profile](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/kamiya-hiroshi.html)

On January 1st 2025 it was announced that he had gotten married to actress and gravure model Rina Aizawa.

**Awards:**
- 2008-03: Best Supporting Actor, 2nd Annual Seiyuu Awards
- 2009-03: Best Lead Actor and Best Personality, 3rd Annual Seiyuu Awards
- 2012-03: Most Votes Award, 6th Annual Seiyuu Awards
- 2013-03: Most Votes Award, 7th Annual Seiyuu Awards  

Hosts several radio talk shows, including Dear Girl ~Stories~ with Ono Daisuke. In May 2010, he and Miyu Irino formed a Kiramune unit called KAmiYU, and sang the theme song for Mokei Senshi Gunpla Builders Beginning G.  Their first mini-album "link-up" was released on August 3, 2011.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
- Neuvillette in Genshin Impact
- Shou Ronpo in Uchu Sentai Kyuranger
- Madrex in Bakuage Sentai Boonboomger
Fujima Hitoshi is a composer and arranger.
Racehorse owner and son of the late [Atsushi Yamatoya](https://anilist.co/staff/200012).

**Height:** 187 cm

[Profile](https://www.81produce.co.jp/dcms_plusdb/index.php/item?cell003=%E3%81%82%E8%A1%8C&label=1&page=3&cell004=&name=%E6%B1%9F%E5%8F%A3%E3%80%80%E6%8B%93%E4%B9%9F&id=18) | [Blog](https://egutaku.exblog.jp) | [Twitter](https://www.twitter.com/egutakuya) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/takuyaeguchi81)

Part of the trio Trignal with fellow seiyuu [Ryouhei Kimura](https://anilist.co/staff/96762) and [Tsubasa Yonaga](https://anilist.co/staff/95556). He hosts a radio show for the Kiramune label (currently Trignal no Kira☆Kira Beat R).

__Non-Anime Roles:__
- Kurt Vander - The Legend of Heroes Series (VG)
- Shoki Ikenami - Persona 5: The Phantom X (VG)

Capcom began in Japan in 1979 as a manufacturer and distributor of electronic game machines. In 1983 Capcom Co., LTD was founded and soon built a reputation for introducing cutting-edge technology and software to the video game market.  Building on its origins as a game machine manufacturer, Capcom is now involved in all areas of the video game industry and has offices in Tokyo, Osaka, California, England, Germany, and Hong Kong.

__[Profile](http://www.ariamusic.co.jp/elements-garden/fujita/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Junpei_Fujita)__

Member of the "music production brand" Elements Garden.

He is an animator and character designer. Motohashi started working at Studio Z. Later, after leaving Studio Z, he started together with Hirayama Satoshi and Kamegaki Hajime Studio Z5. Today he is affiliated with Xebec and is the representative director of its subsidiary Xebec M2.
In March 2010, she graduated from Tokyo Animation College.
In March 2010, she graduated from Tokyo Animation College.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/chau_kotori)

Graduated from Kyoto Seika University in 2012. Japanese animator, director and storyboard artist. Leader and founder of Studio Colorido's Team Yamahitsuji since fall 2018.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/325492584) | [Sakugabooru](https://www.sakugabooru.com/post?tags=tatsuya_yoshihara)

Freelance animator formerly affiliated with [Actas](https://anilist.co/studio/60/) where he was attending its internal animation school and debuted as animator at the age of 20. His work has been greatly influenced by contemporary Kanada school animators [Seiya Numata](https://anilist.co/staff/124320/) and [Hironori Tanaka](https://anilist.co/staff/103979/). 

He's a precocious talent, debuting as episode director at the age of 21 and as director at the age of 23 with [Arve Rezzle](https://anilist.co/anime/13863/), as part of the Young Animator Training Project.

Married to fellow animator [Kikuko Sadakata](https://anilist.co/staff/105769).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tnkzm_tk)

Formerly affiliated with [White Fox](https://anilist.co/studio/314/White-Fox). Currently affiliated with [A-1 Pictures](https://anilist.co/studio/561/A1-Pictures).
